name: Elite SWAT Master Sniper Shooting 3D Pro
name_original: Elite SWAT Master Sniper Shooting 3D Pro
description:
Entering the enemy territory as alone commando, pull the Sniper trigger and shoot down enemy combatants. With unlimited rifle rounds, complete the SWAT mission by shooting the enemy before they kill the civilians. In this exhilarating First Person Sniper Shooter with realistic 3D environment and bullet sounds, complete the SWAT mission.

The Sniper Shooter furnishes a real-life terrain as the young commando enters unchartered territory with directives to kill from the SWAT team. However, your silence is an advantage for catching them off-guard. Shoot down the enemies quickly as speed counts. It’s an all-out war and there’s no extraction. Your only chance is to shoot down all the enemies. Remember to point-and-shoot relentlessly as shots are fired from all directions.


FEATURES
* Shoot to kill at close range
* One shot kill
* Realistic gunfire and environment
